title: En teh u thawhlehna ni chu
lyrics:
En teh u, thawhlehna ni chu,
Lawmna a vul chhuak e;
En teh, suanglungpui a lum bo,
A entir, thlan a hneh.

Isua a tho ta, sawi ang khan,
Hnehin thlan atangin a tho;
Lawmin zaiin thawhlehniah hian,
Isua a tho, Chhandamtu chak chu.

En teh u, a tuamna puan chu,
An zial e, ngun takin;
En teh, ruakin a thim thlan chu,
Isua awm loh vangin.

En teh, piallei a fang leh ta,
A hmangaih ropuiin;
En teh, a lua ropuina,
Chung lama rawn enin.

En teh u, a tuamna puan chu,
Biahthu hrilh zai rem nen;
Thawhlehna thilpek hlu ber chu,
Lal hnehna a ni e.
